author: tabish
msg: A mostly finished implementation of the Failover Transport, lacking only a Factory that can parse the composite URI to build the list of Brokers to attempt to connect to.  The Transport is not tested yet.

author: lryan
msg: Fix for NPE in check to determine whether content output should be sanitized. SHINDIG-958

author: trawick
msg: ab: Fix maintenance of the pollset to resolve EINPROGRESS errors
with kqueue (BSD/OS X) and excessive CPU with event ports (Solaris).
The apr_pollset API requires that a socket be removed from
the pollset whenever there is a change to the requested events.
The socket must also be removed when it is closed.  This wasn't

author: wsobel
msg: Fix for OLIO-57: Increased size of description and summary to increase database size
